```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

Citibike Jan/2019 ~ Dec/2019
```{r}
citibike_df = 
  tibble(
    files = list.files("citibike/"),
    path = str_c("citibike/", files)
  ) |> 
  mutate(data = map(path, read_csv)) |> 
  unnest()
```

Tidy dataset 
```{r}
citibike = citibike_df |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  select(-files, -path) |>
  mutate(gender = recode(gender,
                         "0" = "Unknown",
                         "1" = "Male",
                         "2" = "Female"))
```
